summary: Among the residents of a theatrical boarding house is the last member of a once great acting family, down on his luck. When an offer to star in a London "Hamlet" comes, he takes lessons ... See full summary Â»
cast: Nancy Nash|Earle Foxe|Grant Withers|Lydia Yeamans Titus|Emile Chautard|Raymond Hitchcock|Ted McNamara|Sammy Cohen|Jane Winton|Lillian Worth|Judy King|Harry A. Bailey|Francis Ford|Ely Reynolds|Sammy Blum|Carrie Daumery|Dwight Frye|Anita Garvin|Bertram Johns|Margaret Mann|Frank Finch Smiles
title: Ser o no ser
